Uses of Interface
fr.cnrs.iees.uit.space.Box

  • Packages that use Box 
    Package Description
    fr.cnrs.iees.uit.indexing
    The IndexingTree interface (representing a generic k-d tree) and different kinds of implementation.
    fr.cnrs.iees.uit.indexing.location
    A little auxiliary package for classes used to discretize continuous coordinates based on a given precision.
    fr.cnrs.iees.uit.space
    Basic geometric classes internally used by IndexingTree.

      Constructors in fr.cnrs.iees.uit.indexing with parameters of type Box 
      Constructor Description
      BoundedRegionIndexingTree​(Box domain)
      This constructor assumes that no item will ever lie outside of the box passed as its argument.
      ExpandingLimitedPrecisionIndexingTree​(Box domain, double precision)
      Constructor using an initial box to start with.

    • Uses of Box in fr.cnrs.iees.uit.indexing.location

      Constructors in fr.cnrs.iees.uit.indexing.location with parameters of type Box 
      Constructor Description
      LocatorFactory​(double precision, Box limits)
      This constructor checks that precision*maxDistance is smaller than Long.MAX_VALUE, to prevent any arithmetic overflow. maxDistance is computed as the diagonal length of the Box passed as argument.
